name: RMD-MP
savepath: Another big update for you guys, thanks for your patience! Some new items and bases have been introduced (runeword, unique, etc). Trial levels re-extended to 100 levels, Many loot filter changes and much more. As usual, we also included a healthy round of bug fixes, discovered by users and our team. Enjoy the new update!!

The Sunder Mechanic and Terror Zones are now available via D2RHUD 1.1.2+. This will enable re-created features that mimic the official implementation, but with some slight upgrades and more planned improvements in the future. Please visit our discord for more details about how the systems work and info you might need as a mod author.
